entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rigolet
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow mixed with freezing drizzle. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow or freezing drizzle. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 23. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Cloudy. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 12. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Windy. High plus 4. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 23. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 8. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023
